english:
Thank you for your continued support. In this update, we’ve focused on fixing a few issues that affected the overall experience.

・Fixed a bug where area expansion did not function correctly.
・Fixed an issue that caused UI elements to appear in screenshots.
・Fixed a problem where certain panels remained open after switching scenes.
・Made minor localization corrections for improved clarity.

We appreciate your feedback and will continue polishing the experience.
This update resolves several UI-related issues and improves overall stability and localization accuracy.
